OCD.name: Choropleth Map
OCD.description: Color-codes the named regions on a geographical map in proportion to associated numeric data.

AD.name: Map
AD.description: Map to annotate

AD.name: Projection
AD.description: Mercator is a standard entire-globe projection (though it distorts the size and shape of large objects, especially near the poles). Albers, which preserves area, and Lambert, which preserves angles (or shapes) are recommended for state maps

AD.name: Region Name
AD.description: String attribute that names regions

AD.name: Color By
AD.description: Numeric attribute that determines region color

AD.name: Color Scaling
AD.description: How to scale the color attribute (linear implies no rescaling)

AD.name: Color Range
AD.description: Two colors that the region colors should range between, from least to greatest

OCD.name: Proportional Symbol Map
OCD.description: Maps geospatial coordinates as circles that can be size- and color-coded in proportion to associated numeric data.

AD.name: Map
AD.description: Map to annotate

AD.name: Projection
AD.description: Mercator is a standard entire-globe projection (though it distorts the size and shape of large objects, especially near the poles). Albers, which preserves area, and Lambert, which preserves angles (or shapes) are recommended for state maps

AD.name: Latitude
AD.description: Numeric attribute that determines circle latitude (ranges from -180 (180 degrees west) to +180 (180 degrees east)

AD.name: Longitude
AD.description: Numeric attribute that determines circle longitude (ranges from -90 (90 degrees south) to +90 (90 degrees north)

AD.name: Size Circles By
AD.description: Numeric attribute that determines circle size (that is, area)

AD.name: Size Scaling
AD.description: How to scale the size attribute (linear implies no rescaling)

AD.name: Color Circle Exteriors By
AD.description: Numeric attribute that determines outer color

AD.name: Exterior Color Scaling
AD.description: How to scale the outer color attribute (linear implies no rescaling)

AD.name: Exterior Color Range
AD.description: Two colors that the color should range between, from least to greatest

AD.name: Color Circle Interiors By
AD.description: Numeric attribute that determines inner color

AD.name: Interior Color Scaling
AD.description: How to scale the inner color attribute (linear implies no rescaling)

AD.name: Interior Color Range
AD.description: Two colors that the color should range between, from least to greatest

OCD.name: Geospatial Network Layout plus Base Map
OCD.description: Overlays the geolocated nodes of a network as size- and color-coded circles on a geographical map and annotates the nodes in the network with projected layout coordinates. Special 'anchor nodes' are drawn on the map and laid out in the network to facilitate alignment.

AD.name: Map
AD.description: Map to annotate

AD.name: Latitude
AD.description: Numeric attribute that determines circle latitude (ranges from -180 (180 degrees west) to +180 (180 degrees east)

AD.name: Longitude
AD.description: Numeric attribute that determines circle longitude (ranges from -90 (90 degrees south) to +90 (90 degrees north)
